DataElement.preferredName: Product Investigation Observation Performed Study Activity Foci Duration ISO21090.PQ.TIME.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The completed process of evaluating a product after it has been returned to the manufacturer or reprocessor. The quantity of time in which the observation result is held to be true. EXAMPLE(S): 2 months is the focalDuration for a question such as "Have you smoked in the last 2 months?".

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Product Investigation Observation Performed Study Activity Foci Duration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The act or process of a systematic and thorough examination; research, study; the process of inquiring into or following up, intended to develop facts.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective._Area of greatest concentration, attention, or activity; a central point or locus, especially of an infection.:The period of time during which something continues.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Product Investigation Observation Performed Study Activity
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The act or process of a systematic and thorough examination; research, study; the process of inquiring into or following up, intended to develop facts.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective.

Concepts.definition: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.
The act or process of a systematic and thorough examination; research, study; the process of inquiring into or following up, intended to develop facts.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.
Executed and carried through to completion.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: Area of greatest concentration, attention, or activity; a central point or locus, especially of an infection.:The period of time during which something continues.

Concepts.definition: Area of greatest concentration, attention, or activity; a central point or locus, especially of an infection.
The period of time during which something continues.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: DEC released per model owner approval.  mc 2/2/11

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Constrains PQ to have units that describe a period of time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happened. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.
